segments.text: Hi , boss . You wanted to see me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Zina . Look , I know when I hired you , I told you I'd pay you a salary . But I just can't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me ? I hope I didn't just hear what I think I just heard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it's awkward , but you're going to be thanking me later . I'm going to make you rich .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're going to make me rich by not paying me ?
segments.speaker: S1
